metadata.title: CVE-2021-28038 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.11.3, as used withXen PV. A certain part of the netback driver lacks necessary treatment oferrors such as failed memory allocations (as a result of changes to thehandling of grant mapping errors). A host OS denial of service may occurduring misbehavior of a networking frontend driver. NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-26931.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
